title: Drone Workshop
desc: Learn - Create - Build  Fly your Drone! Fly Away!! Our Drones Workshop is a perfect platform for a novice to start exploring the world of quadrotors.

title: VR & Metaverse Workshop
desc: Want to be the next Elon Musk? Or want to do something in unexplored fields just like SpaceX and Tesla? So far, our experience with the internet has been two-dimensional at best. But, virtual reality is going to upend the world and cause a monumental shift in the way we surf, shop and experience the web. Want to learn more? Buckle up the experience of VR & Metaverse at our workshop!

title: Blockchain and NFT Workshop

title: RT-PCR Workshop
desc: Ever wondered how the Covid tests became so quick? Or how DNA testing and identification is done with such criminal little evidence? Say no more! Sign up and learn anything and everything under Real Time - PCR and other magics of gene biology!
